item.title: Lack of road closures signs and diversions, 29th April
item.description:
Manor road and running road. Well done you’ve brought chaos to Swindon village and the rounding area. With manor road closed for 17 weeks and you had grid locked traffic constantly on Wymans lane from McDonald’s to Hyde lane under-bridge.If emergency services can’t get through and people are hurt because of this traffic. I hope there is a public enquiry into the decision maker. You seriously need to review the situation. Divert traffic if possible at evesham road junction and give plenty of road closure signs back to and on the approach of the double roundabout on Wymans lane and Kingsditch lane. It is very obvious you did no data gathering on how many vehicles use this area of cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
